articles.title: Asia stocks head for monthly gains on US trade deal hopes; Nikkei hits 1-yr high - Investing.com

articles.content: Investing.com Most Asian stocks rose on Monday and headed for sharp monthly gains, supported by hopes of trade deals with U.S. President Donald Trump, while attention for the day was on factory activ… [+2262 chars]
